citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on
22-Feb-18.
Inspector arrived to the facility and no one was available. The licensee was contacted via text and phone call. The
licensee then informed that no one was available for inspection and updated optimal hours were discussed during
the telephone conversation.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on
22-Feb-18.
Inspector arrived to the facility and no one was available. The licensee was contacted via text and phone call. The
licensee then informed that no one was available for inspection and updated optimal hours were discussed during
the telephone conversation.
